entries.assembly_enclosure: Forms the protective casing for the device's electronics.
entries.assorted_fruit: This is a draft schematic for a set of assorted fruit that can be used as a decoration.
entries.bacta_tank: This is a draft schematic for a large bacta tank that is non-functional, but can be used as a display.
entries.basket_closed: This is a draft schematic for a decorative closed basket.
entries.booster_charge: A booster charge launches fireworks into the sky.
entries.bottle_fat: This is a draft schematic for a short, fat decorative glass bottle.
entries.bottle_pear: This is a draft schematic for a pear shaped decorative glass bottle.
entries.bottle_tall: This is a draft schematic for a tall decorative glass bottle.
entries.bubble_tank: This draft schematic is for a decorative bubble tank.
entries.bug_habitat: An engineered creature habitat that will keep a small sample of creatures alive and well for an extended period of time.  You can release these creatures into the wild if you want.
entries.burster_charge: A burster charge explodes the firework just as it reaches the perfect altitude.
entries.cafe_chair: This draft schematic is for a chair like the ones used in outdoor cafes.
entries.campfire: This draft schematic creates a permanently lit campfire, used as a decoration.
entries.cantina_chair: This draft schematic is for a chair like the ones used in cantinas.
entries.capacitor_bank: This bank of capacitors is used to temporarily store a large electrical charge.
entries.carved_bowl: This is a draft schematic for a carved wooden bowl.
entries.carved_plain: This is a draft schematic for a plain wooden bowl.
entries.chemical_recycler: A draft schematic for a Chemical Recycler.
entries.coffee_table_modern: This draft schematic is used to create a modern coffee table.
entries.command_console: This draft schematic creates command console.
entries.controller: Acts as the interface and controller device for the mechanisms subsystems.
entries.corellian_flagpole: A draft schematic for a Corellian flag, high atop a flagpole.
entries.couch_blue: A draft schematic for a blue couch.
entries.creature_recycler: A draft schematic for a Creature Recycler.
entries.diagnostic_screen: This draft schematic is used to create a diagnostic screen.
entries.droid_body: This draft schematic creates a protocol droid body, which is non-functional and used only for decoration.
entries.droid_head: This draft schematic is used to make a non-functioning protocol droid head.
entries.elegant_cabinet: This draft schematic is for a cabinet that matches the elegant furniture set.
entries.executioners_hack_schematic: A draft schematic for a weapon called an Executioner's Hack.
entries.firespray_schematic: This is a complete schematic for a Kuat Systems Engineering Firespray ship.  Using this object will grant you a limited number of uses of the Firespray draft schematic.
entries.flora_recycler: A draft schematic for a Flora Recycler.
entries.fluidic_drilling_pumping_unit: This is used in the process of drilling for and pumping fluids.
entries.foodcart: This draft schematic is used to make a decorative food cart.
entries.gambling_table: This draft schematic is used to make a gambling table.
entries.hanging_planter: This draft schematic is used to make a hanging plant.
entries.landspeeder_av21_schematic: This is a schematic for an AV-21 landspeeder.
entries.laser_assembly: A laser used for cutting and burning while slicing.
entries.light_ore_mining_unit: This module is used to give smaller harvesting installations their capabilities.
entries.mandalorian_jetpack: This is a draft schematic for creating a Mandalorian jetpack.
entries.mandalorian_wine_schematic: Carefully recorded on the datapad is the recipe for how to make Mandalorian Wine.
entries.metal_recycler: A draft schematic for a Metal Recycler.
entries.microphone: This draft schematic is used to make a microphone.
entries.ore_mining_unit: This is used in the process of mining for ore.
entries.ore_recycler: A draft schematic for an Ore Recycler.
entries.parallel_control_unit: While not required to assemble this device, the addition of a high-quality Electronic Control Unit can make a Medic MultiTool that much better.
entries.park_bench: This is a draft schematic for a generic bench.
entries.pistol_de_10_schematic: A draft schematic for a DE-10 style pistol.
entries.pitcher_full: This draft schematic is used to create a pitcher full of water.
entries.power_core_unit: The power core is the heart of a building's energy output.
entries.power_plant_av21: A power plant for an AV-21 Landspeeder
entries.professors_desk: This draft schematic is used to create a desk, like the ones used by professors at the universities.
entries.radar_screen: This draft schematic creates a radar screen.
entries.radio: This draft schematic can be used to create a radio.
entries.razor_knuckler_schematic: A draft schematic for a weapon called a Razor Knuckler.
entries.rifle_berserker_schematic: A schematic for a berserker rifle.
entries.sample_bugs: A sample of some kind of creature taken from a lair.  An artisan could probably find an interesting way to display these creatures.  This is crafted with a live creature sample collected from a lair.
entries.scanner_assembly: Scans for the requested materials at user-configurable distances.
entries.secondary_sensor_suite: While not required to assemble this device, the addition of a high-quality Micro Sensor Suite can make a Medic MultiTool that much better.
entries.shared_harvesting_mechanism: This enables a structure to harvest materials.
entries.shared_manufacturing_mechanism: This enables a structure to manufacture materials.
entries.shellfish_harvester_schematic: Tool used to locate mollusks and crustaceans.
entries.shisa: This draft schematic is used to make a shisa.
entries.slave_brazier: This draft schematic is used to create a decorative brazier.
entries.small_storage_module: A small module built for storage.
entries.small_structure_storage_module: This storage module is designed for a small structure.
entries.spear_rack: This draft schematic is used to create a decorative weapon rack.
entries.storage_unit: Self-contained storage space for gathered materials and items.
entries.stove: This draft schematic is used to create a portable stove.
entries.streetlamp: This draft schematic is used to create a street lamp.
entries.structural_module: A basic unit of a structure.
entries.structure_storage_module: This storage module creates a storage unit, for gathered materials and items.
entries.stuffed_fish: This draft schematic is used to create a decorative fish.
entries.tanning_hide_s01: This draft schematic makes a tanned, stretched hide that can be used for decoration.
entries.tanning_hide_s02: This draft schematic makes a tanned, stretched hide that can be used for decoration.
entries.tatooine_tapestry: This draft schematic creates a flag of Tatooine.
entries.tech_console_s01: This is a draft schematic for a standard technical console.
entries.tech_console_s02: This is a draft schematic for a standard technical console.
entries.throw_pillow: This draft schematic is for making a throw pillow.
entries.tumble_blender: A draft schematic for a Tumble Blender.
entries.utensils: This draft schematic is for making kitchen utensils.
entries.weapon_high_power_module: This is a high power module for energy weapons.
entries.trandoshan_hunter_rifle_schematic: An engineering schematic for the Trandoshan Hunter's Rifle. A master weaponsmith would be able to understand this schematic and learn how to make the rifle from it.
entries.weapon_must_2h_lightsaber_schematic: This technical readout provides information on how to create a unique two-handed lightsaber hilt.
entries.weapon_must_1h_lightsaber_schematic: This technical readout provides information on how to create a unique one-handed lightsaber hilt.
entries.turbo_fluidic_drilling_pumping_unit: This is used in the process of drilling for and pumping fluids.
entries.turbo_fluidic_drilling_pumping_unit_adva: This is an advanced model of the original pump unit. This is used in the process of drilling and pumping fluids.
entries.ore_mining_unit_advanced: An advanced version of an ore mining unit. This is used in the process of mining for ore.
entries.shared_heavy_harvesting_mechanism_advanc: An advanced version of the heavy harvesting mechanism. This enables a structure to manufacture materials.
entries.jets: Stabilizer jets are used to increase mobility of ships.
entries.nightsister_gem_bead: A gemstone bead taken from a Nightsister.
entries.nightsister_gold_gem: A gold bead taken from a Nightsister.
entries.nightsister_gold_wire: A piece of gold wire taken from a Nightsister.
entries.nightsister_green_bead: A green bead taken from Nightsister.
entries.nightsister_clasp: A jewelry clasp taken from a Nightsister.
entries.corrective_inducer: The corrective inducer is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.current_motivator: The current motivator is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.cycle_control: The cycle control is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.decoherence_sensor: The decoherence sensor is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.directional_sensor: The directional sensor is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.loop_auditor: The loop auditor is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.momentum_compensator: The momentum compensator is a sub-component used in crafting.
entries.particle_sensor: The particle sensor is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.signal_cleanup_unit: The signal cleanup unit is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.signal_rerouter: The signal rerouter is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.spin_alignment_inducer: The spin alignment inducer is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.transductive_shunt: The transductive shunt is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.tuning_cell: The tuning cell is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.variance_throttle: The variance throttle is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
entries.voltage_inducer: The voltage inducer is a sub-componenet used in crafting.
